Fill your life with the colour of Culture and nature, press the below link to download Prarang App. Please press again to exit Sorry, no letters here, choose other geography!
Skip Done
Home# Click on any post to open it.
Select Geography# Select a City, Region & Country of your interest. You can select one in each category or opt to choose \'All\'. By default, \'All\' is already selected.
Profile# Here you can upload your photo, select the language of your choice, access the City Portals and also browse the application tutorials.
Post# Once you click on a picture on the Home tab, the whole post opens up. You can share, like, save and comment on the post as well.
Swipe for next post# Swipe right or left to navigate between posts.
Balance# This tab allows you to analyse the City/Region related posts according to the classification and tags allotted to them. This section is divided into two major parts - Culture & Nature - and each part is further sub-divided into three parts. These sub divisions further have ten parts, which make 60 complete tags.
City Portals# This tab allows you to access the Prarang City Portals. Click on any of the Cities and you will be redirected to the respective city\'s portal in your browser. The Portals contain a variety of features including the city\'s Weather, Sports, News, Entertainment, Employment, Business and a lot more.
Bank# Saved letters can be seen in this tab. Once you have saved a post in your Bank, you can even access it offline.
